situation.title: Measures on free movement
situation.meta_description: Free movement in the Czech Republic is limited at the moment.

content.processed:
Rules and Recommendations

Free movement in the Czech Republic is limited at the moment. However, there are exceptions to these measures. Between 21:00 and 04:59, free movement is permitted only to people who: travel to or from work, carry out activities related to safety, health protection, public infrastructure or supply and delivery service, walking the dog, but not more than 500 meters from their place of residence. You can also leave your residence between 9 o'clock in the evening and 5 o'clock in the morning for urgent reasons (e. g. a trip to the hospital, floods, etc.).

In the period from 5:00 to 20:59, free movement is allowed in several cases. These are, for example, trips to or from work, to family or close people (a close person is one whose suffering you would feel as your own, it can be for example your girlfriend/boyfriend), in order to provide basic needs (e. g. buying food, medicine or pet supplies), to authorities, to the post office or, for example, for individual spiritual care. You can also travel to nature, to cottages or to school. Find the complete list. 

However, we should now limit the time away from home to the necessary cases. Please also limit contact with other people.

It is possible to stay in publicly accessible places with a maximum of 2 people and it is necessary to keep a distance of at least 2 meters from the others. This does not apply to household members (the person you live with), or for example work colleagues, in this case there may be more than two.

questions_answers.question: Can I travel to work?
questions_answers.value: Yes, trips to work are possible.

questions_answers.question: Can I travel with my family?
questions_answers.value: Yes, family trips are possible if necessary.

questions_answers.question: Can I visit my partner if I don't live with them?
questions_answers.value: Yes, this is a close person. A visit is possible if necessary.

questions_answers.question: Can I go to a wedding or a funeral?.
Can I go to my cottage or chalet?
Is it possible to travel by train or inter city transport?
questions_answers.value:
Yes. It is necessary 
to observe the covering of the mouth and nose (expand). Due to reduced demand, the number of connections may be reduced.

questions_answers.question: I'm currently not home. Can I travel back through the country?
Is it possible to use the services of a car repair shop to change the tires on a car?
Can I go to the office to exchange my driver's license?
questions_answers.value: Yes. However, we recommend that you handle official matters only in urgent cases.

questions_answers.question: Can I organize a tourist trip with friends?
questions_answers.value: No. Staying outside is only possible in a group of maximum 2 people with exceptions (expand).

questions_answers.question: Can I walk the dog outside?
Can I take a dog when I'm in isolation or quarantine?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but only if it is absolutely necessary and this activity cannot be provided by another person. If necessary be careful and try to avoid people.

questions_answers.question: Can I go on a holiday?
questions_answers.value: No. Hotels, guesthouses etc. are closed for these purposes.

questions_answers.question: Can I go on a one-day or multi-day business trip?
questions_answers.value: Yes. Accommodation services can be used for business trips.

questions_answers.question: Can I visit the church?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but only for individual spiritual care.

questions_answers.question: Can I go jogging around town?
questions_answers.value: No. But you can in the park or in nature.
